description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nThe Golden Sign:
At the start of battle, your creatures either gain 100% {STAT_attack} and {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN}, or 100% {STAT_intelligence} and {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}. This trait does not stack.
name: Illuminator's Token
